December 20, 2011

Presentation: The Jekyll Static Site Generator

by Ralph Miller

Flatterline founder and lead Ruby developer, Curtis Miller, had the opportunity to present at the monthly Phoenix Ruby meetup. Having recently switched the Flatterline site from Wordpress to the Jekyll static site generator, he presented his thoughts and experience using Jekyll.

If you have any questions about Jekyll or how Flatterline is using it to create our site, please contact us and we'll be happy to help out. You can also peruse the source of the Flatterline site on GitHub.

In the meantime, check out the presentation:

Jekyll Presentation Slides

About the Author

Ralph is our professional seo consultant who handles the business and marketing for our clients at Flatterline. When not chasing down leads or backlinks you can find him meditating, practicing yoga or polishing his, er... lightsaber.
